title: [Health] Few countries offer a good place to die. Money doesn’t always guarantee attention to end-of-life care. In the U.S., resources are often invested in last-ditch efforts to extend life, rather than measures to ensure comfort and quality of life in a patient’s final days.
[Medicine] UCI study could explain why Parkinson’s drug improves, then diminishes quality of life | L-dopa-protein complex may cause cellular iron overload in brain, leading to side effects
